people.name: David Grusch
people.title: Former Intelligence Officer & Whistleblower
people.known_for: Congressional UAP testimony, crash retrieval claims

quotes.text: I was informed in the course of my official duties of a multi-decade UAP crash retrieval and reverse engineering program.
Non-human biologics came with some of these recoveries.

people.name: Luis Elizondo
people.title: Former Pentagon AATIP Director
people.known_for: AATIP program, "Imminent" book, To The Stars Academy
people.affiliations: Former Pentagon, To The Stars Academy

quotes.text: My personal belief is that there is very compelling evidence that we may not be alone.
UAPs represent a potential national security threat unlike anything we have ever faced.

people.name: Danny Sheehan
people.title: Attorney & UAP Advocate
people.known_for: New Paradigm Institute, UAP legal advocacy
people.affiliations: New Paradigm Institute, Whistleblower legal representation

quotes.text: We are on the verge of the most significant disclosure in human history.
My client has direct knowledge of crash retrieval operations conducted by the US government.

people.name: Ross Coulthart
people.title: Investigative Journalist & Author
people.known_for: David Grusch interview, "In Plain Sight" book, UFO investigations
people.platform: NewsNation, Books, Need To Know Podcast
people.affiliations: NewsNation (current), Former Seven Network, Nine Network

quotes.text: Some of these objects are not capable of being moved because they're too bloody big... I know exactly where it is… It's absolutely gobsmacking that it's been kept a secret.
Belief is an expression of religious faith... My belief is irrelevant. It is not the case that there is no proof at all behind Mr Grusch's allegations.
There should be an investigation… into what I characterize as the intelligence community's effort to try and discredit a good human being.
I was skeptical about CE5 and summoning UAP craft until I witnessed it with Tier 1 operators who are Psionic Assists trained by the US military…
I don't care if people say this is crazy… I don't care if people laugh or ridicule it, because I know from the sources that I've spoken to, this story will eventually come out.
BOMBSHELL: The Pentagon has more videos. This is just the beginning of disclosure.
I have obtained videos that will change everything we know about UAPs.
